front.title: The Data Model of Network Infrastructure Device Infrastructure Layer Security Baseline

abstract.t: This document is one of the companion documents which describes the infrastructure layer security baseline YANG output for network infrastructure devices. The infrastructure layer security baseline covers the security functions to secure the device itself, and the fundamental security capabilities provided by the device to the upper layer applications. In this specific document, the integrity measurement, cryptography algorithms, key management, and certificate management are sorted out to generate the data model.
